publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3084 Iain Gray: The Draft Scotland Act 1998 (Modifications of Schedule 5) Order 2002-That the Transport and the Environment Committee recommends that the draft Scotland Act 1998 (Modifications of Schedule 5) Order 2002 be approved. Supported by: Lewis Macdonald*

S1M-3084 Iain Gray: The Draft Scotland Act 1998 (Modifications of Schedule 5) Order 2002-That the Transport and the Environment Committee recommends that the draft Scotland Act 1998 (Modifications of Schedule 5) Order 2002 be approved. Supported by: Lewis Macdonald
